shows.title: Jesus, the Last Inkling, and the Evolution of Consciousness
shows.desc:
Owen Barfield is the Oxford Inkling you haven’t heard of. He argued that Jesus’ life encapsulated a major shift in the evolution of human consciousness. What does this mean for our view of Jesus and Christianity, as this evolution continues?

Dr Mark Vernon is a writer, commentator and psychotherapist, regular contributor to radio, press, the School of Life – and Greenbelt.
